name: Midnight Ultra
description: In the American Southwest, a lone witch hunter travels across the desert, seeking to wipe out cultists of all sorts. Fight a variety of goons and ghouls, through small towns to dimension-spanning motels. Blast your way through a neon-dripped, pixelated nightmare in this high-speed, high-thrills FPS.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.80GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
